resources.string: You have new messages from our support team. Tap to view.

You have received the property \"%1$s\" from %2$s.
You’ve received a property transfer request. Tap to review the request.
Your transfer request has been rejected. Please try again later or contact the recipient for further information.
You’ve received a property transfer request. Tap to review the request.
Your property transfer request has been accepted.
You’ve received a claim request for property %1$s from %2$s.
